I just created a bugfix for the Parameterized runner. The pull request slig=
htly modifies the behaviour of the runner. Today the @Parameter method is c=
alled when TestClassRunnerForParameters.createTest() is called(). After my =
change the method is called when the Parameterized runner is created.

Does=
 anybody know a reason, why we shouldn't do this modification.

stefan
